General.Name: Shenzhen Center Power Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Center Power Tech. Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sales of valve-regulated sealed lead-acid batteries, lithium-ion batteries, and fuel cells in China. The company's products are used in communications, electric vehicles, energy storage, electricity, UPS, and IDC data centers. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

4.Name: Mr. Liu  Gang
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
